29000597.en: <voice 00001_29000597><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>This light... It's!?<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000597.ja: <voice 00001_29000597><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>「この光……は！？<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000597.ko: <voice 00001_29000597><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>: 이 빛……은!?<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000597.zh-Hans: <voice 00001_29000597><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>这道光……是什么？！<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000597.zh-Hant: <voice 00001_29000597><start_lip_sync n00340 _normal m00001>這道光……是什麼！？<stop_lip_animation n00340 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000598.ja: <voice 00002_29000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>「まぶしいんですよッ！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000598.ko: <voice 00002_29000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>: 눈부셔 죽겠습니다!!<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000598.zh-Hant: <voice 00002_29000598><start_lip_sync n00378 _normal m00001>好刺眼喔！！<stop_lip_animation n00378 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000599.en: <voice 00003_29000599><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>It's just like that time...!?<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000599.ja: <voice 00003_29000599><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>「これは　あの時の……！？<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000599.ko: <voice 00003_29000599><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>: 이건 그때 그……!?<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000599.zh-Hans: <voice 00003_29000599><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>这是当时的……？！<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000599.zh-Hant: <voice 00003_29000599><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>這是當時的……！？<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50869.en:
<voice 00972_00050869><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>You've done well. It appears that Mishua's memories
have returned.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50869.ja:
<voice 00972_00050869><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ご苦労さまです。
　どうやら　ミシュアさんの記憶は
　取り戻せたようですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50869.ko:
<voice 00972_00050869><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 수고 많으셨습니다.
　보아하니 미슈아 씨의 기억을
　되찾으신 것 같군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50869.zh-Hans:
<voice 00972_00050869><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>辛苦了，
看来米修娅
恢复记忆了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50869.zh-Hant:
<voice 00972_00050869><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>辛苦了，
看來蜜雪雅
恢復記憶了。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50870.en: <voice 03828_00050870><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>, doesn't this look familiar?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50870.ja: <voice 03828_00050870><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「<pc>さん。見覚えがありませんか？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50870.ko: <voice 03828_00050870><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: <pc> 씨, 어딘가 낯익지 않습니까?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50870.zh-Hans: <voice 03828_00050870><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>，你有印象吗？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50870.zh-Hant: <voice 03828_00050870><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001><pc>，你有印象嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50871.en: <voice 03938_00050871><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This light is the light you once saw...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50871.ja: <voice 03938_00050871><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「この光は　かつて　あなたが見た光……。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50871.ko: <voice 03938_00050871><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 이 빛은 일찍이 당신이 본 빛…….<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50871.zh-Hans: <voice 03938_00050871><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>这道光，就是你以前见过的光……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50871.zh-Hant: <voice 03938_00050871><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>這道光，就是從前你看過的光……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50872.en:
<voice 04098_00050872><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>That's right... It's the same light you saw when you
were resurrected and given a new destiny.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50872.ja:
<voice 04098_00050872><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「そう……。あなたが　生き返しを受け
　新たな運命を得た地で見た　あの光なのです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50872.ko:
<voice 04098_00050872><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그래요……. 당신이 부활의 술법으로 되살아나
　새 삶을 얻은 땅에서 본 바로 그 빛입니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50872.zh-Hans:
<voice 04098_00050872><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>没错……就是你复活时，
在接受全新命运之地看见的那道光。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50872.zh-Hant:
<voice 04098_00050872><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>沒錯……就是你復活時，
在接受全新的命運之地看見的那道光。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50873.en:
<voice 04268_00050873><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This strange time gap... Mishua and Princess Anlucia
existing as two living copies of one another...<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50873.ja:
<voice 04268_00050873><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「この奇妙な時間のズレ……。
　ミシュアさんと　アンルシア姫という
　生き写しのような　ふたりの存在……。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50873.ko:
<voice 04268_00050873><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 이 기묘한 시간 차…….
　미슈아 씨와 안루시아 공주라는
　쌍둥이 같은 두 사람의 존재…….<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50873.zh-Hans:
<voice 04268_00050873><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>这不可思议的时间差……
米修娅与安露西雅公主
那仿佛互照镜子般的存在……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50873.zh-Hant:
<voice 04268_00050873><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>這不可思議的時間差……
蜜雪雅與安露西亞公主
那彷彿互照鏡子般的存在……<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50874.en:
<voice 04398_00050874><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>There seems to be some great secret hidden in this
world.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50874.ja:
<voice 04398_00050874><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「この世界には　何か　大きな秘密が
　隠されているようですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50874.ko:
<voice 04398_00050874><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 이 세계에는 뭔가 거대한 비밀이
　숨겨져 있는 것 같습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50874.zh-Hans:
<voice 04398_00050874><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>这个世界似乎
隐藏着什么巨大的秘密。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50874.zh-Hant:
<voice 04398_00050874><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>這個世界似乎
隱藏著什麼巨大的祕密。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50875.en:
<voice 05175_00050875><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>...My true name is Anlucia. Born as the princess of
Gran Zedora Kingdom and now awakened as the
Legendary Hero.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50875.ja:
<voice 05175_00050875><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「……私の本当の名は　アンルシア。
　グランゼドーラ王国の姫として　生まれ
　今　伝説の勇者として　目覚めました。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50875.ko:
<voice 05175_00050875><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: ……제 진짜 이름은 안루시아.
　그랑제도라 왕국의 공주로 태어나
　지금 전설의 용사로 각성했습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50875.zh-Hans:
<voice 05175_00050875><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>……我真正的名字是安露西雅。
我是古兰泽朵拉王国的公主，
现在以传说中勇者的身份觉醒。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50875.zh-Hant:
<voice 05175_00050875><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>……我真正的名字是安露西亞。
我是古蘭澤朵拉王國的公主，
現在以傳說中勇者的身分覺醒。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50876.en:
<voice 05315_00050876><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>My brother's death saddened me so much that I sealed
away my own memories and power of the Hero...<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50876.ja:
<voice 05315_00050876><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「兄さまの死を　悲しむあまりに
　私は　自分が勇者であるという記憶すらも
　自らのチカラで　封じてしまっていた……。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50876.ko:
<voice 05315_00050876><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 오라버니의 죽음이 너무나 슬펐던 나머지
　전 제가 용사라는 기억마저
　제 힘으로 봉인하고 말았습니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50876.zh-Hans:
<voice 05315_00050876><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>因为兄长大人的死令我过于悲痛，
我便将自己身为勇者的记忆，
以自己的力量亲手封印了……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50876.zh-Hant:
<voice 05315_00050876><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>因為兄長的死令我過於悲痛，
我便將自己身為勇者的記憶，
以自己的力量親手封印了……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50877.en: <voice 05540_00050877><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>But now, I will no longer hesitate!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50877.ja: <voice 05540_00050877><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「でも　もう　迷いはありません！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50877.ko: <voice 05540_00050877><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이제 도망치지 않겠어요!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50877.zh-Hans: <voice 05540_00050877><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>但是，我不会再迷惘了！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50877.zh-Hant: <voice 05540_00050877><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>但是，我不會再迷惘了！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50878.en:
<voice 05705_00050878><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>Thank you, <pc>. It's because of you I was able
to awaken.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50878.ja:
<voice 05705_00050878><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　<pc>さん。
　私が　こうして　勇者として
　目覚められたのは　あなたのおかげ。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50878.ko:
<voice 05705_00050878><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다, <pc> 씨.
　제가 이렇게 용사로
　각성할 수 있었던 건 당신 덕분이에요.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50878.zh-Hans:
<voice 05705_00050878><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<pc>，
我能像这样觉醒为勇者
都是多亏了你。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50878.zh-Hant:
<voice 05705_00050878><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<pc>，
我能像這樣覺醒為勇者
都是多虧了你。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50879.en:
<voice 05850_00050879><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>If you hadn't come here to Lendersia, I would have
been stuck as Mishua for who knows how long...<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50879.ja:
<voice 05850_00050879><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「あなたが勇者を探して　五大陸から
　このレンダーシアへ　来てくれなければ
　私は　ずっと　ミシュアのままでした……。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50879.ko:
<voice 05850_00050879><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 당신이 용사를 찾아 다섯 대륙에서
　렌더시아로 오지 않았다면
　전 계속 미슈아로 지냈을 거예요…….<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50879.zh-Hans:
<voice 05850_00050879><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>要不是你为了寻找勇者，
从五大陆来到冷达西亚，
我就永远只能是米修娅了……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50879.zh-Hant:
<voice 05850_00050879><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>要不是你為了尋找勇者，
從五大陸來到冷達西亞，
我就永遠只能是蜜雪雅了……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50880.en: <voice 05980_00050880><start_lip_sync n02392 _normal m00001>...Oi! What was that light just now!?<stop_lip_animation n02392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50880.ja: <voice 05980_00050880><start_lip_sync n02392 _normal m00001>「……おい！　今の光は　いったい　なんだ！？<stop_lip_animation n02392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50880.ko: <voice 05980_00050880><start_lip_sync n02392 _normal m00001>: ……이봐! 방금 그 빛은 대체 뭐야!?<stop_lip_animation n02392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50880.zh-Hans: <voice 05980_00050880><start_lip_sync n02392 _normal m00001>……喂！刚才那道光到底是什么？！<stop_lip_animation n02392 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50880.zh-Hant: <voice 05980_00050880><start_lip_sync n02392 _normal m00001>……喂！剛才那道光到底是什麼！？<stop_lip_animation n02392 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50881.en:
<voice 06100_00050881><start_lip_sync n02398 _normal m00001>I... I don't know!! All of a sudden, a bright light
shone from the tower!<stop_lip_animation n02398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50881.ja:
<voice 06100_00050881><start_lip_sync n02398 _normal m00001>「わ……わかりません！！
　突然　この塔から光が　あふれだしました！<stop_lip_animation n02398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50881.ko:
<voice 06100_00050881><start_lip_sync n02398 _normal m00001>: 모…… 모르겠습니다!!
　갑자기 이쪽 탑에서 빛이 뿜어져 나왔습니다!<stop_lip_animation n02398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50881.zh-Hans:
<voice 06100_00050881><start_lip_sync n02398 _normal m00001>我……我不知道！！
这座塔突然就开始发光了！<stop_lip_animation n02398 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50881.zh-Hant:
<voice 06100_00050881><start_lip_sync n02398 _normal m00001>我……我不知道！！
這座塔突然就開始發光了！<stop_lip_animation n02398 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50882.en:
<voice 06305_00050882><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>...Now, I clearly understand. This place is really
different that the Gran Zedora I know.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50882.ja:
<voice 06305_00050882><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「……今の私には　はっきりと　わかります。
　ここは　私の知っているグランゼドーラとは
　まったく　ちがう場所だって。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50882.ko:
<voice 06305_00050882><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: ……이제는 확실히 알겠어요.
　이곳은 제가 아는 그랑제도라와
　완전히 다른 곳이란 걸요.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50882.zh-Hans:
<voice 06305_00050882><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>……我现在很清楚，
这里和我熟悉的
古兰泽朵拉完全不同。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50882.zh-Hant:
<voice 06305_00050882><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>……我現在很清楚，
這裡和我熟悉的
古蘭澤朵拉完全不同。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50883.en:
<voice 06420_00050883><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>Where in the world, this place is, I don't know... But
we need to find out what the other me is trying to do.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50883.ja:
<voice 06420_00050883><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「いったい　ここは　どこなのか……
　もうひとりの私が　何をしようとしているのか
　確かめなきゃいけないわ。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50883.ko:
<voice 06420_00050883><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 여기가 대체 어딘지……
　또 한 명의 제가 뭘 하려는 건지
　확인해야 해요.<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50883.zh-Hans:
<voice 06420_00050883><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>这里到底是哪里……
另一个我究竟想做什么，
我必须得去确认。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50883.zh-Hant:
<voice 06420_00050883><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>這裡到底是哪裡……
另一個我究竟想做什麼，
我必須確認才行。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50884.en:
<voice 06560_00050884><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>However, first, we need to slip out of the castle.
I'm certain that this wall should be a secret door!
From there, we can leave outside the castle!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50884.ja:
<voice 06560_00050884><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「だけど　まずは　この城を抜けださないと。
　たしか　こっちのカベに　隠し扉があったはず！
　そこから　城の外に出ましょう！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50884.ko:
<voice 06560_00050884><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 그러려면 우선 이 성을 빠져나가야 해요.
　아마 이쪽 벽에 비밀 문이 있을 거예요!
　거길 통해 성 밖으로 탈출하죠!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50884.zh-Hans:
<voice 06560_00050884><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>但得先离开这座城堡才行。
我记得那道墙上有扇暗门！
我们从那里出去吧！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50884.zh-Hant:
<voice 06560_00050884><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>但得先離開這座城堡才行。
我記得那道牆上有扇隱藏門！
我們從那裡出去吧！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50885.en:
<voice 00514_00050885><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Heheh... I've been waiting for you, Mishua. Or should
I call you... Anlucia?<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50885.ja:
<voice 00514_00050885><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「ふふっ。待っていたぞ　ミシュア。
　いや。アンルシア……と呼ぶべきか？<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50885.ko:
<voice 00514_00050885><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 후후. 기다리고 있었다, 미슈아.
　아니지. 안루시아……라고 불러야 하나?<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50885.zh-Hans:
<voice 00514_00050885><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>呵呵，我等你好久了，米修娅。
不对，我应该叫你……安露西雅，对吗？<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50885.zh-Hant:
<voice 00514_00050885><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>呵呵，我等妳好久了，蜜雪雅。
不對，我應該叫妳……安露西亞，對嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50886.en:
<voice 00547_00050886><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>This traitor told me you were coming. So here I am,
waiting.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50886.ja:
<voice 00547_00050886><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「この裏切り者から　お前のもとへ
　<pc>を向かわせたと　聞いてな。
　こうして　待っていたのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50886.ko:
<voice 00547_00050886><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 이 배신자가 {pc}|hpp(을,를)
　네게 보냈다고 들어서 말이다.
　이렇게 기다리고 있었지.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50886.zh-Hans:
<voice 00547_00050886><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我从这个叛徒口中听说
他让<pc>去了你那里，
便在这等候大驾光临了。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50886.zh-Hant:
<voice 00547_00050886><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我從這個叛徒口裡聽說
他讓<pc>去了妳那裡，
便在這等候大駕光臨了。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50887.en:
<voice 00687_00050887><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>The light of the Hero's Awakening. I, too, witnessed
it. Finally restored you memories, have you?
Congratulations, Anlucia.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50887.ja:
<voice 00687_00050887><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「勇者覚醒の光。私も　見せてもらったよ。
　ついに　記憶を取り戻したんだろう？
　おめでとう　アンルシア。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50887.ko:
<voice 00687_00050887><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 용사 각성의 빛, 나도 잘 봤어.
　드디어 기억을 찾았나 보지?
　축하해, 안루시아.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50887.zh-Hans:
<voice 00687_00050887><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>勇者觉醒之光，我也看到了哦。
你的记忆终于恢复了吧？
恭喜你，安露西雅。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50887.zh-Hant:
<voice 00687_00050887><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>勇者覺醒時的光，我也看到了喔。
妳的記憶終於恢復了吧？
恭喜妳，安露西亞。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50888.en: <voice 00827_00050888><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>...Just who are you?<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50888.ja: <voice 00827_00050888><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「……あなたは　何者なんですか？<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50888.ko: <voice 00827_00050888><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: ……넌 대체 누구지?<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50888.zh-Hans: <voice 00827_00050888><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>……你是什么人？<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50888.zh-Hant: <voice 00827_00050888><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>……妳是什麼人？<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71113.en:
<voice 00907_00071113><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>What do you think you're doing, masquerading as
me!?<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71113.ja:
<voice 00907_00071113><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「私の名と姿をかたって　いったい
　何をしようと　しているの！？<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71113.ko:
<voice 00907_00071113><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 내 이름과 모습을 베껴서 대체
　뭘 하려는 거야!?<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71113.zh-Hans:
<voice 00907_00071113><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>你假冒我的名字，扮成我的样子，
到底想要做什么？！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71113.zh-Hant:
<voice 00907_00071113><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>妳冒用我的名字和容貌，
到底想要做什麼！？<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50890.en:
<voice 01017_00050890><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Shut up! I'm not masquerading as anything! I am
Gran Zedora Kingdom's Princess Anlucia. I was born
to be the Hero!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50890.ja:
<voice 01017_00050890><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「かたってなど　いない！
　私は　グランゼドーラ王国の姫　アンルシア。
　勇者となるべく　生まれてきた者だっ！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50890.ko:
<voice 01017_00050890><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 베낀 적 따윈 없다!
　난 그랑제도라 왕국의 공주 안루시아.
　용사가 되기 위해 태어난 자다!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50890.zh-Hans:
<voice 01017_00050890><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我可没假冒！
我是古兰泽朵拉王国的公主安露西雅，
背负勇者使命而降生之人！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50890.zh-Hant:
<voice 01017_00050890><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我可沒冒用！
我是古蘭澤朵拉王國的公主安露西亞，
背負勇者使命而降生之人！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71114.en:
<voice 01087_00071114><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>I will take your power. From then on, I will be the
True Hero.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71114.ja:
<voice 01087_00071114><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「お前のチカラは　私がもらう。
　これからは　私が　本物の勇者となるのさ。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71114.ko:
<voice 01087_00071114><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 네 힘은 내가 차지하겠어.
　앞으로는 내가 진짜 용사가 되는 거지.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71114.zh-Hans:
<voice 01087_00071114><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>你的力量我收下了。
今后我来当真正的勇者。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71114.zh-Hant:
<voice 01087_00071114><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我要接收妳的力量。
從今以後，換我來當真正的勇者。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71115.en: <voice 01167_00071115><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>My power...? I won't allow you do such a thing!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71115.ja:
<voice 01167_00071115><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「私のチカラを……？
　そんなことは　させない！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71115.ko:
<voice 01167_00071115><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 내 힘을……?
　그렇게 내버려두지 않겠어!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71115.zh-Hans:
<voice 01167_00071115><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>想要我的力量……
我不会让你得逞的！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71115.zh-Hant:
<voice 01167_00071115><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>接收我的力量……？
妳別想得逞！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50893.en:
<voice 01267_00050893><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Hyohyohyoo. With the results of my research, it will
be simple.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50893.ja:
<voice 01267_00050893><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「ヒョーヒョヒョッ。
　私の研究成果をもってすれば　簡単なこと。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50893.ko:
<voice 01267_00050893><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 우효효.
　제 연구 성과를 이용하면 간단한 일이지요.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50893.zh-Hans:
<voice 01267_00050893><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>哟哟哟，
只要有我的研究成果，简直是小事一桩。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50893.zh-Hant:
<voice 01267_00050893><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>喲喲喲，
只要有我的研究成果，簡直是小事一樁。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71116.en:
<voice 01397_00071116><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Before now, I have extracted the power of many to be
given to the Princess, you see.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71116.ja:
<voice 01397_00071116><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「これまでにも　多くの者のチカラを抽出し
　姫さまに　お与えしてきましたからねえ。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71116.ko:
<voice 01397_00071116><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 지금까지도 수많은 자의 힘을 추출해
　공주님께 바쳐 왔으니까요.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71116.zh-Hans:
<voice 01397_00071116><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>目前为止我已经抽出过很多人的力量
注入给公主殿下了。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71116.zh-Hant:
<voice 01397_00071116><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>我之前已經抽取許多人的力量，
交給公主了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71117.en: <voice 01577_00071117><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>N...No, was my grandson among those too...?<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71117.ja: <voice 01577_00071117><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>「ま……まさか　その中に　私の孫も……？<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71117.ko: <voice 01577_00071117><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>: 서…… 설마 그중에 내 손자도……?<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71117.zh-Hans: <voice 01577_00071117><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>难……难道说，那些人中还有我的孙子？<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71117.zh-Hant: <voice 01577_00071117><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>難……難不成，我的孫子也是其中之一……？<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71118.en:
<voice 01642_00071118><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Your grandson, Tegram, also gave his life for me.
His power is with me now. You should be honored,
Old Man Dyme.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71118.ja:
<voice 01642_00071118><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「お前の孫　テグラムも　私に命を捧げてくれた。
　そのチカラは今　私と共にある。
　光栄に思うがいいぞ　ダイム老。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71118.ko:
<voice 01642_00071118><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 네 손자 테그람도 내게 목숨을 바쳤다.
　그 힘은 지금 나와 함께 있지.
　영광으로 생각해라, 다임 공.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71118.zh-Hans:
<voice 01642_00071118><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>你的孙子提古拉姆也把生命献给我了。
他的力量与我同在。
你应该觉得光荣，戴姆爷爷。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71118.zh-Hant:
<voice 01642_00071118><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>你的孫子提古拉姆也把生命奉獻給我了。
如今他的力量與我同在，
你應該覺得光榮啊，戴姆爺爺。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71119.en: <voice 01758_00071119><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>...No. I knew it, Tegram... *sob*...<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71119.ja:
<voice 01758_00071119><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>「……ううっ。やはり　テグラムは……。
　うあああっ……。<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71119.ko:
<voice 01758_00071119><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>: ……으윽. 역시 테그람은…….
　으흐흐흑…….<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71119.zh-Hans:
<voice 01758_00071119><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>呜呜……提古拉姆他果然……
呜呜呜……<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71119.zh-Hant:
<voice 01758_00071119><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>……嗚嗚！提古拉姆真的已經……
嗚啊啊啊……！<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71120.ja: <voice 02142_00071120><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「なんて　ひどいことを……。<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71120.ko: <voice 02142_00071120><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 어떻게 그런 끔찍한 짓을…….<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71120.zh-Hans: <voice 02142_00071120><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>居然做这么过分的事……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71120.zh-Hant: <voice 02142_00071120><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>真是太過分了……<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71121.en: <voice 02312_00071121><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Hmph... Kirgyl. Let's start right away.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71121.ja:
<voice 02312_00071121><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「ふん……。
　キルギル。すぐに始めろ。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71121.ko:
<voice 02312_00071121><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 흥…….
　키르길. 당장 시작해라.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71121.zh-Hans:
<voice 02312_00071121><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>哼……
基尔吉尔，马上开始吧。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71121.zh-Hant:
<voice 02312_00071121><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>哼……
基爾吉爾，趕快開始吧。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50900.en: <voice 02462_00050900><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Hyohyoo. Your wish is my command.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50900.ja: <voice 02462_00050900><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「ヒョヒョッ。かしこまりまして　ございます。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50900.ko: <voice 02462_00050900><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 효효, 알겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50900.zh-Hans: <voice 02462_00050900><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>哟哟，我知道了。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50900.zh-Hant: <voice 02462_00050900><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>喲喲，我知道了。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71122.en:
<voice 03196_00071122><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Hyohyoo? As expected of the Hero's power. It appears
this won't be so simple after all, will it. So be it,
maximum power!!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71122.ja:
<voice 03196_00071122><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「ヒョヒョッ？　さすが　勇者のチカラ。
　簡単には　いかないようですねえ。
　ならば　最大出力ぅっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71122.ko:
<voice 03196_00071122><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 우효효? 과연 용사의 힘.
　쉽지는 않군요.
　그렇다면 최대 출력으로!!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71122.zh-Hans:
<voice 03196_00071122><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>嘻嘻嘻？真不愧是勇者之力。
想要抽出来还真不容易。
那就把功率开到最大！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71122.zh-Hant:
<voice 03196_00071122><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>嘻嘻！果然不愧是勇者的力量，
看來沒那麼好對付啊。
那就把功率開到最大！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71123.ja: <voice 03553_00071123><start_lip_sync n02070 _normal m00001>「ぐわあっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02070 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71124.ja: <voice 03643_00071124><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>「ダイムさんっ！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71124.ko: <voice 03643_00071124><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>: 다임 씨!<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71124.zh-Hans: <voice 03643_00071124><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>戴姆爷爷！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71124.zh-Hant: <voice 03643_00071124><start_lip_sync n02076 _normal m00001>戴姆先生！<stop_lip_animation n02076 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71125.en: <voice 04218_00071125><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...I can't absorb that power.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71125.ja: <voice 04218_00071125><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「……チカラを吸えぬか。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71125.ko: <voice 04218_00071125><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: ……힘을 흡수하지 못한 건가.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71125.zh-Hans: <voice 04218_00071125><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……吸收不了她的力量吗？<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71125.zh-Hant: <voice 04218_00071125><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……無法吸取力量嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71126.en:
<voice 04278_00071126><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Higigigi... This exceeds my calculations! To get more
power, only Creation Magic will do...<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71126.ja:
<voice 04278_00071126><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「ヒギギギ……。私の計算を超えるとは。
　これ以上のパワーを出すには
　創生の魔力を　もってするしか……。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71126.ko:
<voice 04278_00071126><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 끄으으응……. 내 계산을 뛰어넘다니.
　더 큰 파워를 내려면
　창생의 마력을 이용하는 방법밖에…….<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71126.zh-Hans:
<voice 04278_00071126><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>咿咿咿……竟然会超出我的计算。
想要输出更大的功率，
只能运用创生魔力……<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71126.zh-Hant:
<voice 04278_00071126><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>咿咿咿咿……竟然超出我的估算。
如果要再輸出更多力量，
就只能動用創生魔力……<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

71127.en:
<voice 04423_00071127><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>If that's the case, let's go to the Creation Vortex.
If I must use that vortex to become the Hero, then
so be it.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71127.ja:
<voice 04423_00071127><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「ならば　創生の渦へ　向かうぞ。
　私が　勇者となるためならば
　禁を破ることになろうと　かまわない。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
71127.ko:

卻被破壞得看不出原樣了……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50923.en:
<voice 00822_00050923><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>They don't seem to be here. Let's leave outside the
village to look for the Creation Vortex.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50923.ja:
<voice 00822_00050923><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あの人たち　ここには　いないみたいね。
　村の外に出て　創生の渦を探してみましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50923.ko:
<voice 00822_00050923><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그 사람들은 이곳엔 없는 것 같아요.
　마을 밖에서 창생의 소용돌이를 찾아 봐요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50923.zh-Hans:
<voice 00822_00050923><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>他们似乎不在这里，
到村外去找创生漩涡吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50923.zh-Hant:
<voice 00822_00050923><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>他們似乎不在這裡，
到村外去找創生漩渦吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000607.en: <voice 00823_29000607><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>Hmm...? <pc>, what's wrong?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000607.ja:
<voice 00823_29000607><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>「ん……？　<pc>
　どうかしたか？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000607.ko:
<voice 00823_29000607><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>: 응……?
　<pc>, 왜 그래?<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000607.zh-Hans:
<voice 00823_29000607><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯……？<pc>，
怎么啦？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000607.zh-Hant:
<voice 00823_29000607><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>嗯……？<pc>，
怎麼啦？<stop_lip_animation n00330 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000608.en: <voice 00824_29000608><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>Is something bothering you?<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000608.ja: <voice 00824_29000608><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>「何か　気になることでも？<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000608.ko: <voice 00824_29000608><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>: 뭐 신경 쓰이는 거라도 있나요?<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000608.zh-Hans: <voice 00824_29000608><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>有什么在意的吗？<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000608.zh-Hant: <voice 00824_29000608><start_lip_sync n00092 _normal m00001>有什麼在意的嗎？<stop_lip_animation n00092 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000609.en:
<voice 00825_29000609><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>, you look like an Azlantelope. You seem
quiet... Lonely...<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000609.ja:
<voice 00825_29000609><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「<pc>さま
　カムシカみたいな　かお。
　穏やかなような……寂しいような……。<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000609.ko:
<voice 00825_29000609><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: <pc> 님
　카무시카 같은 표정이야.
　평온한 듯하면서…… 쓸쓸해 보이는…….<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000609.zh-Hans:
<voice 00825_29000609><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>大人的脸
像是神鹿一样呢，
感觉很温和……又很寂寞……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000609.zh-Hant:
<voice 00825_29000609><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001><pc>大人
一臉像是神鹿一樣呢，
感覺很溫和……又很寂寞……<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50924.en: <voice 00180_00050924><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That's the Creation Vortex...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50924.ja: <voice 00180_00050924><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あれが　創生の渦……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50924.ko: <voice 00180_00050924><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 저게 창생의 소용돌이…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50924.zh-Hans: <voice 00180_00050924><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那就是创生漩涡……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50924.zh-Hant: <voice 00180_00050924><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>那就是創生漩渦……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50925.en:
<voice 00580_00050925><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>That cave is the only place we haven't checked yet.
We might be able to get to the Creation Vortex inside
there.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50925.ja:
<voice 00580_00050925><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「調べていないのは　あとは　あそこだけね。
　あの洞くつを抜ければ　創生の渦へ
　たどり着けるかもしれないわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50925.ko:
<voice 00580_00050925><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 조사해 보지 않은 건 저기뿐이에요.
　저 동굴을 빠져나가면 창생의 소용돌이에
　갈 수 있을지도 몰라요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50925.zh-Hans:
<voice 00580_00050925><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>只剩那里还没调查过了。
穿过那个洞窟，
也许就能抵达创生漩涡。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50925.zh-Hant:
<voice 00580_00050925><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>只剩那裡還沒調查過了。
穿過那個洞窟，
也許就能抵達創生漩渦。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50926.en:
<voice 00700_00050926><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Let's check inside, <pc>. We need to
hurry to the Creation Vortex, or we won't catch those
people.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50926.ja:
<voice 00700_00050926><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「中に入ってみましょう　<pc>さん。
　創生の渦にいる　あの人たちに
　早く　追いつかないと。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50926.ko:
<voice 00700_00050926><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 안으로 들어가 봐요, <pc> 씨.
　창생의 소용돌이로 간 그 사람들을
　어서 따라잡아야 해요.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50926.zh-Hans:
<voice 00700_00050926><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我们进去吧，<pc>。
得快点追上
创生漩涡那里的那些人才行。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50926.zh-Hant:
<voice 00700_00050926><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>
我們進去吧，<pc>。
得快點追上
在創生漩渦那的那些人才行。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50928.en:
<voice 00620_00050928><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Hyoh? I truly didn't expect you to have followed us
here. What a pitiful, foolish test subject you are!
Hyohhyohhyoh!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50928.ja:
<voice 00620_00050928><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「ヒョッ？　まさか　本当に追ってくるとは。
　なんと　あわれで　おろかなる実験素材。
　ヒョーヒョッヒョッ！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50928.ko:
<voice 00620_00050928><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 응? 설마 정말로 쫓아올 줄이야.
　참으로 가엾고 어리석은 실험 소재로군.
　우효효!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50928.zh-Hans:
<voice 00620_00050928><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>哟？没想到你们真的追来了。
真是可怜又愚蠢的实验材料，
哟哟哟！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50928.zh-Hant:
<voice 00620_00050928><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>喲？沒想到你們真的追來了。
真是可憐又愚蠢的實驗材料，
喲喲喲！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50929.en: <voice 00730_00050929><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Test subject...? Just what are you scheming!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50929.ja:
<voice 00730_00050929><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「実験素材……？
　いったい　何を企んでいるの！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50929.ko:
<voice 00730_00050929><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 실험 소재……?
　대체 뭘 꾸미고 있는 거야!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50929.zh-Hans:
<voice 00730_00050929><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>实验材料……？
你到底想做什么？！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50929.zh-Hant:
<voice 00730_00050929><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>實驗材料……？
你到底想做什麼！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50930.en:
<voice 00820_00050930><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Good grief... Seems I must teach you ignorant,
uneducated fools a lesson.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50930.ja:
<voice 00820_00050930><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「やれやれ。無知で無学で無教養な　あなた方に
　特別に　教えてさしあげましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50930.ko:
<voice 00820_00050930><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 이런. 지식도, 학식도, 교양도 없는
　당신들에게 특별히 가르쳐 드리죠.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50930.zh-Hans:
<voice 00820_00050930><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>真受不了，我就特别告诉你们这些
无知又没教养的无礼家伙吧。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50930.zh-Hant:
<voice 00820_00050930><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>真受不了，我就特別告訴你們這些
無知又不受教的無禮傢伙吧。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50931.en: <voice 00955_00050931><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>THAT IS THE CREATION VORTEX!!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50931.ja: <voice 00955_00050931><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「あれこそは　創生の渦！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50931.ko: <voice 00955_00050931><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 저것이 바로 창생의 소용돌이!!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50931.zh-Hans: <voice 00955_00050931><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>那就是创生漩涡！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50931.zh-Hant: <voice 00955_00050931><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>那就是創生漩渦！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50932.en:
<voice 01015_00050932><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>A symbol of power that connects to the source of the
Creation Magic... A power said to give birth to
everything!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50932.ja:
<voice 01015_00050932><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「すべてを創りだし　生みだす
　創生の魔力の……その根源に通じるという
　チカラの象徴なのです！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50932.ko:
<voice 01015_00050932><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 모든 것을 창조하고 탄생시키는
　창생의 마력…… 그 근원과 닿아 있는
　힘의 상징입니다!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50932.zh-Hans:
<voice 01015_00050932><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>创造并孕育万物，
与创生魔力的根源相通的……力量的象征！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50932.zh-Hant:
<voice 01015_00050932><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>創造並孕育萬物，
與創生魔力的根源相通的……力量的象徵！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50933.en:
<voice 01080_00050933><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>The magic that lies within that vortex... Can you
imagine what it is actually capable of?<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50933.ja:
<voice 01080_00050933><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「あの渦に秘められた魔力……。
　はたして　どれほどのものなのか
　あなた方に　想像できますか？<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50933.ko:
<voice 01080_00050933><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 저 소용돌이가 품고 있는 마력이…….
　과연 어느 정도일지 상상이 되십니까?<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50933.zh-Hans:
<voice 01080_00050933><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>那个漩涡秘藏的魔力……
各位能想象
究竟有多少吗？<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50933.zh-Hant:
<voice 01080_00050933><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>那個漩渦祕藏的魔力……
各位能想像
究竟有多少嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50934.en:
<voice 01140_00050934><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>...You can't, can you? But fret not. You will experience
its power soon enough.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50934.ja:
<voice 01140_00050934><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「……できませんよねえ？
　でも　悲観することは　ありませんよ。
　すぐに　体験できるのですから。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50934.ko:
<voice 01140_00050934><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: ……상상도 안 되지요?
　하지만 비관하실 필요 없습니다.
　이제 곧 몸소 느끼게 되실 테니까요.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50934.zh-Hans:
<voice 01140_00050934><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>……想象不到吧？
不用难过，
你们很快就能亲身体验了。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50934.zh-Hant:
<voice 01140_00050934><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>……想像不到吧？
不用難過，
你們很快就能親身體驗了。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50935.en:
<voice 01230_00050935><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>At this very moment, our Princess is about to plunge
into the immense magical power swirling about in
that vortex.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50935.ja:
<voice 01230_00050935><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「我が姫さまは　まさに今！
　創生の渦に秘められた　絶大な魔力を
　その身に　宿そうとしているところなのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50935.ko:
<voice 01230_00050935><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 저희 공주님은 바로 지금!
　창생의 소용돌이의 강대한 마력을
　그 몸에 받아들이고 계십니다.<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50935.zh-Hans:
<voice 01230_00050935><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>公主殿下此时此刻！
正要将创生漩涡藏有的超凡魔力
移转到自己身上。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50935.zh-Hant:
<voice 01230_00050935><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>公主就在現在！
正要將創生漩渦藏有的超凡魔力
移轉到自己身上喔。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50936.en:
<voice 01280_00050936><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>With the Creation Magic, the Princess' power will be
unmatched! It will surely surpass the Hero's power!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50936.ja:
<voice 01280_00050936><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「創生の魔力を得た　姫さまのチカラは
　この私ですら　計り知れないものとなり
　確実に　勇者のチカラを超えるでしょう！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50936.ko:
<voice 01280_00050936><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 창생의 마력을 얻으신 공주님의 힘은
　저조차 가늠하기 힘들 만큼 강력해져
　용사의 힘마저 능가할 겁니다!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50936.zh-Hans:
<voice 01280_00050936><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>得到创生魔力后，
公主殿下将强大得连我都无法预测，
一定能超越勇者的力量吧！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50936.zh-Hant:
<voice 01280_00050936><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>得到創生魔力後，
公主將強大得連我都無法預測，
一定能超越勇者的力量吧！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50937.en: <voice 01465_00050937><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I won't allow you all to do whatever you wish!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50937.ja: <voice 01465_00050937><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「あなたたちの思いどおりには　させない！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50937.ko: <voice 01465_00050937><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 당신들 뜻대로 하게 놔두지 않겠어!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50937.zh-Hans: <voice 01465_00050937><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我不会让你们如愿的！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50937.zh-Hant: <voice 01465_00050937><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我不會讓你們如願的！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50938.en: <voice 01555_00050938><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>Regrettable, but it's already too late for that now...<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50938.ja: <voice 01555_00050938><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「残念ですが　もう遅いのですよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50938.ko: <voice 01555_00050938><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 안됐지만 이미 늦었습니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50938.zh-Hans: <voice 01555_00050938><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>可惜，已经太迟了……<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50938.zh-Hant: <voice 01555_00050938><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>可惜，已經太遲了……<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50939.en:
<voice 01600_00050939><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>I can feel it... Feel it! At last, the Princess is now
one with the Creation Magic! Hyoohyohhyoh!!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50939.ja:
<voice 01600_00050939><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>「感じる……感じますよ！
　ついに　姫さまが　創生の魔力をっ。
　ヒョーヒョッヒョッ！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50939.ko:
<voice 01600_00050939><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>: 느껴진다…… 느껴져!
　마침내 공주님이 창생의 마력을……!
　우~효효효!!<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50939.zh-Hans:
<voice 01600_00050939><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>感受到了……我感受到了！
公主殿下终于得到创生魔力了。
哟哟哟！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50939.zh-Hant:
<voice 01600_00050939><start_lip_sync n02069 _normal m00001>感受到了……我感受到了！
公主終於得到創生魔力了。
喲喲喲！！<stop_lip_animation n02069 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50940.en: <voice 02810_00050940><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Hehehe... The Creation Magic courses through me...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50940.ja:

<voice 05089_00050944><start_lip_sync m50067 _normal m00001>With the Creation Magic, I have gained the power to

50945.zh-Hans:
<voice 05279_00050945><start_lip_sync m50067 _normal m00001>我想做的却只有一件事，

<voice 03571_00050961><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I will not allow her to hurt you any more,
