<voice 04309_00050964><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……
你們兩個一起上，
也不會改變結果。<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50965.en: <voice 04494_00050965><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>Now, Anlucia. Give the power of the Hero to me!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50965.ja:
<voice 04494_00050965><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「さあ　アンルシア。
　お前の勇者のチカラを　私に寄こすがいい！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50965.ko:
<voice 04494_00050965><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>: 자, 안루시아.
　네 용사의 힘을 내게 내놔라!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50965.zh-Hans:
<voice 04494_00050965><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>来吧，安露西雅，
把你身上的勇者之力给我吧！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50965.zh-Hant:
<voice 04494_00050965><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>來吧，安露西亞，
把妳身上的勇者之力給我吧！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50966.en:
<voice 9727_a><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>If I unleash my Hero's power, we can destroy this
monster!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50966.ja:
<voice 9727_a><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「私の　勇者のチカラをぶつければ
　この化け物も　滅ぼすことができるはず。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50966.ko:
<voice 9727_a><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 내 용사의 힘을 사용하면
　이 괴물도 물리칠 수 있을 거야.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50966.zh-Hans:
<voice 9727_a><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>用我的勇者之力对抗，
应该就能打败这个怪物。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50966.zh-Hant:
<voice 9727_a><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>只要用我的勇者之力與之對抗，
應該就能打敗這個怪物。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50967.en:
<voice 9727_b><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Until I can unleash that power, I want you to keep
her occupied. We must combine our strength as one!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50967.ja:
<voice 9727_b><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「私が　勇者のチカラを放ったら
　化け物に　こん身の攻撃を　お願い。
　みんなのチカラを　ひとつにするの！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50967.ko:
<voice 9727_b><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 내가 용사의 힘을 방출하면
　온 힘을 다해 저 괴물을 공격해.
　모두의 힘을 하나로 합치는 거야!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50967.zh-Hans:
<voice 9727_b><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>当我释放勇者之力时，
请你全力攻击怪物。
大家一起合力攻击！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50967.zh-Hant:
<voice 9727_b><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>當我釋放勇者之力時，
請你全力攻擊怪物。
大家一起合力攻擊！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50970.ja: <voice 00029_00050970><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「……うぐあああっ！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50970.zh-Hans: <voice 00029_00050970><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>……唔咕啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50970.zh-Hant: <voice 00029_00050970><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>……唔咕啊啊啊！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50971.en:
<voice 00082_00050971><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>How can this be... Even with the Creation Magic,
I am still no match for the Hero's power!!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50971.ja:
<voice 00082_00050971><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「なんということだ……。
　創生の魔力をもってしても
　勇者のチカラには　及ばぬというのか！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50971.ko:
<voice 00082_00050971><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>: 이럴 수가…….
　창생의 마력으로도
　용사의 힘을 당해낼 수 없단 말인가!!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50971.zh-Hans:
<voice 00082_00050971><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>怎么可能……
创生魔力竟然
还是不如勇者的力量吗！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50971.zh-Hant:
<voice 00082_00050971><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>怎麼可能……
創生的魔力竟然
還是不如勇者的力量嗎！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50972.ja: <voice 00981_00050972><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「うっうう……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50973.en:
<voice 01091_00050973><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Heh... Hehe... Looks like I wasn't good enough
after all...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50973.ja:
<voice 01091_00050973><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「ふ……ふふ。やはり　私では
　ダメだったということらしい……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50973.ko:
<voice 01091_00050973><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 후…… 후후.
　역시 난 역부족이란 건가…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50973.zh-Hans:
<voice 01091_00050973><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>呵……呵呵，我果然
还是不够格啊……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50973.zh-Hant:
<voice 01091_00050973><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>呵……呵呵，我果然
還是不夠格啊……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50974.en:
<voice 01110_00050974><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>I am, in the end, a fabricated being... Becoming
something like the True Hero, was impossible...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50974.ja:
<voice 01110_00050974><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「私は　しょせん　創られた存在。
　本物の勇者になど　なれるわけが
　なかったのさ……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50974.ko:
<voice 01110_00050974><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 난 어차피 만들어진 존재니까.
　진짜 용사가 될 순 없었던 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50974.zh-Hans:
<voice 01110_00050974><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我只不过是被创造出来的存在，
不可能成为
真正的勇者……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50974.zh-Hant:
<voice 01110_00050974><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我只不過是被創造出來的存在，
不可能成為
真正的勇者……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50975.en: <voice 01186_00050975><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>A fabricated... Being?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50975.ja: <voice 01186_00050975><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「創られた……存在？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50975.ko: <voice 01186_00050975><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 만들어진…… 존재?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50975.zh-Hans: <voice 01186_00050975><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>被创造出来的……存在？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50975.zh-Hant: <voice 01186_00050975><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>被創造出來的……存在？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50976.en:
<voice 01260_00050976><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...That's right. To become the Hero and trade places
with you, I was born from this Creation Vortex.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50976.ja:
<voice 01260_00050976><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「……そうだ。
　私は　勇者となって　お前と入れ替わるため
　この創生の渦から　生みだされた。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50976.ko:
<voice 01260_00050976><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: ……그래.
　난 용사가 되어 너와 바꿔치기할 목적으로
　이 창생의 소용돌이에서 만들어졌다.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50976.zh-Hans:
<voice 01260_00050976><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……是啊，
我是为了成为勇者，替换掉你，
才从这个创生漩涡中诞生的。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50976.zh-Hant:
<voice 01260_00050976><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……是啊，
我是為了成為勇者來替換掉妳，
從這創生漩渦中被創造出來的。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50977.en: <voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...By the hand of the Great Demon King, Madesagora.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50977.ja: <voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「……大魔王　マデサゴーラの手によってな。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50977.ko: <voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: ……대마왕 마데사고라에 의해서.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50977.zh-Hans: <voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……由大魔王马蒂桑贡拉亲手创造出来的。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50977.zh-Hant: <voice 01301_00050977><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……由大魔王馬德沙葛拉親手創造出來的。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50978.en: <voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Great Demon King Madesagora...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50978.ja: <voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「大魔王マデサゴーラ……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50978.ko: <voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 대마왕 마데사고라…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50978.zh-Hans: <voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>大魔王马蒂桑贡拉……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50978.zh-Hant: <voice 01380_00050978><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>大魔王馬德沙葛拉……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50979.en:
<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>But I wasn't able to awaken as the Hero. I was looked
down upon as an utter failure, and Great Demon King
washed his hands of me...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50979.ja:
<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「だが　私は　勇者として覚醒できなかった。
　できそこないの失敗作と　さげすまれ
　大魔王に　見切りをつけられたのさ……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50979.ko:
<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 하지만 난 용사로 각성하지 못했다.
　덜떨어진 실패작이라며 냉대당한 끝에
　대마왕에게 버림받았지…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50979.zh-Hans:
<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>不过，我无法觉醒成为勇者，
便被当作没用的失败品，
被大魔王抛弃了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50979.zh-Hant:
<voice 01445_00050979><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>不過，我無法覺醒成為勇者。
於是便被當作沒用的失敗品，
被大魔王拋棄了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50980.en:
<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>And yet, I couldn't just give up... For me, excluding
becoming the Hero, I had nothing else to live for, so...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50980.ja:
<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「それでも　あきらめきれなかった……。
　私には　勇者となる以外に
　生きている価値などないのだから……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50980.ko:
<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 그래도 포기할 수 없었다…….
　용사가 되지 못하면
　난 살아 있을 가치가 없으니까…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50980.zh-Hans:
<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我还是无法放弃……
因为我除了成为勇者以外，
没有其他活下去的意义了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50980.zh-Hant:
<voice 01515_00050980><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我還是無法放棄……
因為我除了成為勇者以外，
沒有其他活下去的意義了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50981.en: <voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>...To awaken, I did everything. Everything I could.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50981.ja:
<voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「……覚醒するために　なんでもやった。
　できることは　すべてだ。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50981.ko:
<voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: ……각성하기 위해서라면 뭐든 했다.
　내가 할 수 있는 건 전부 다.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50981.zh-Hans:
<voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……为了觉醒，我什么都试过了。
只要我做得到的，全都试过了。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50981.zh-Hant:
<voice 01615_00050981><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>……為了覺醒，我什麼都試過了。
只要我做得到的，全都試過了。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50982.en:
<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>However, no matter the method, the time of awakening
never came... That's when you appeared...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50982.ja:
<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「しかし　何をしようと　覚醒の時は訪れない。
　そのときだ。お前が現れたのは……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50982.ko:
<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 하지만 무슨 짓을 해도 각성할 수 없었지.
　바로 그때였다. 네가 나타난 게…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50982.zh-Hans:
<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>可不论我做什么，都无法迎来觉醒。
就在那时，你出现了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50982.zh-Hant:
<voice 01675_00050982><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>可不論我做什麼，都迎不來覺醒的那刻。
就在那時，妳出現了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50983.en:
<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>My body trembled, I was so overjoyed. If I took the
True Hero's powers, then, finally, I would become
the Hero...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50983.ja:
<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「私の身体は　歓喜に打ちふるえたよ。
　本物の勇者から　そのチカラを奪えば
　ついに　勇者になれると……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50983.ko:
<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 내 몸은 환희에 전율했다.
　진짜 용사에게서 힘을 빼앗으면
　마침내 용사가 될 수 있을 거란 생각에…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50983.zh-Hans:
<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我因过于兴奋而浑身颤抖。
想着只要从真正的勇者身上夺取力量，
我就能成为勇者了……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50983.zh-Hant:
<voice 01921_00050983><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我因過於興奮而渾身顫抖。
想著只要從真正的勇者身上奪取力量
就能成為勇者……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50984.en: <voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>And this is what I have to show for it...<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50984.ja: <voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「その結果が　このザマさ……。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50984.ko: <voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그 결과가 이거다…….<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50984.zh-Hans: <voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>结果如你所见……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50984.zh-Hant: <voice 02152_00050984><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>結果如你所見……<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50985.en:
<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>Let me tell you something... I am not the only one
the Great Demon King has created.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50985.ja:
<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「いいことを教えてやろう……。
　大魔王に創られたのは　この私だけじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50985.ko:
<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 좋은 정보를 알려 주마…….
　대마왕이 만든 건 나 하나만이 아니다.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50985.zh-Hans:
<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我告诉你些有用的事吧……
大魔王创造出的并不只有我。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50985.zh-Hant:
<voice 02394_00050985><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>我告訴你些有用的事吧……
大魔王創造出的並不只有我。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50986.en:
<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>All who live in this land... Everything that exists here
was created by the Great Demon King with the
Creation Vortex's magical power.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50986.ja:
<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「この地に生きる者のすべてが……。
　存在する物のすべてが　大魔王によって
　創生の渦の魔力で　創りだされたものだ。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50986.ko:
<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 이 땅에 사는 모든 생물이…….
　존재하는 모든 것이 대마왕에 의해
　창생의 소용돌이의 마력으로 만들어진 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50986.zh-Hans:
<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>在这片土地生活的所有人……
存在的所有事物，都是大魔王利用
创生漩涡的魔力制造出来的。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50986.zh-Hant:
<voice 02536_00050986><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>在這片土地生活的所有人……
存在的所有事物，都是大魔王利用
創生漩渦的魔力製造出來的。<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50987.en:
<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>This is False Lendersia! This land itself is a fabrication,
a cursed world that cannot be saved!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50987.ja:
<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「ここは　偽りのレンダーシア！
　この地そのものが　創られた存在であり
　救われることのない　呪われし世界なのさ！！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50987.ko:
<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 이곳은 가짜 렌더시아!
　이 땅 자체가 만들어진 존재이자
　구원받을 수 없는 저주받은 세계다!!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50987.zh-Hans:
<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>这里是假的冷达西亚！
这片土地也是被创造出来的，
是无可救药的被诅咒的世界！！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50987.zh-Hant:
<voice 02613_00050987><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>這裡是偽冷達西亞！
這片土地也是被創造出來的存在，
是一個沒有救贖、被詛咒的世界！！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50988.ja:
<voice 02722_00050988><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>「ふふふ……はははははっ。
　……あははははははははっ！！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50988.ko:
<voice 02722_00050988><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>: 후후후…… 하하하하하.
　……아하하하하하하하하!!<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50988.zh-Hans:
<voice 02722_00050988><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……哈哈哈哈哈。
……啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50988.zh-Hant:
<voice 02722_00050988><start_lip_sync n02068 _normal m00001>呵呵呵……哈哈哈哈哈。
……啊哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈！！<stop_lip_animation n02068 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50989.en: <voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>She, too, was suffering from her own fate...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50989.ja: <voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「彼女も　自分の運命に苦しんでいたのね……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50989.ko:
<voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이 사람도 자신의 운명에
　고통받았던 거구나…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50989.zh-Hans: <voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>看来她也为自己的命运所苦……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50989.zh-Hant: <voice 03167_00050989><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>看來她也為自己的命運所苦……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50990.en:
<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Be that as it may, if everything in this world is a
fabrication... Then what in the world is the Great
Demon King planning?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50990.ja:
<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それにしても　この世界のすべてが
　創られたものだなんて……。
　大魔王は　いったい　何をしようとしているの？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50990.ko:
<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그런데 이 세계의 모든 것이
　만들어진 거라니…….
　대마왕은 대체 뭘 꾸미는 거지?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50990.zh-Hans:
<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>而且没想到，
这个世界竟然全是被创造出来的……
大魔王到底有什么目的？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50990.zh-Hant:
<voice 03222_00050990><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>而且沒想到，
這個世界竟然全是被創造出來的……
大魔王到底有什麼目的？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50991.en:
<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>In addition... If this really is False Lendersia, then the
True Lendersia is...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50991.ja:
<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それに……。
　ここが　偽りのレンダーシアだとしたら
　本当のレンダーシアは……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50991.ko:
<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 게다가…….
　이곳이 가짜 렌더시아라면
　진짜 렌더시아는……?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50991.zh-Hans:
<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>而且……
如果这里是假的冷达西亚，
那真正的冷达西亚……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50991.zh-Hant:
<voice 03282_00050991><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>而且……
如果這裡是偽冷達西亞，
那真正的冷達西亞……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50992.en: <voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>It seems you have learned the secret of this world.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50992.ja: <voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「この世界の秘密を　知ったようですね。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50992.ko: <voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 이 세계의 비밀을 아셨군요.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50992.zh-Hans: <voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你好像知道了这个世界的秘密。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50992.zh-Hant: <voice 03332_00050992><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你好像知道了這個世界的祕密。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50993.en:
<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>I have been waiting for this moment. When the True
Hero awakens to destroy the False Hero, this exact
moment.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50993.ja:
<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「私は　この時を待っていました。
　真の勇者が目覚め　偽りの勇者を打ち滅ぼす
　まさに　この時を。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50993.ko:
<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 전 이 순간만을 기다렸습니다.
　진짜 용사가 각성해
　가짜 용사를 무찌를 이 순간만을.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50993.zh-Hans:
<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>我一直在等待这一刻。
真正的勇者觉醒，
将虚假的勇者打败的这一刻。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50993.zh-Hant:
<voice 03417_00050993><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>我一直在等待這一刻。
真正的勇者覺醒，
將冒牌勇者打敗的這一刻。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50994.en:
<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>What has become of the Lendersia you once knew...
The means to learn it exists here.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50994.ja:
<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「あなたのいた　レンダーシアが
　今　どうなっているか……。
　知る手段は　ここにあります。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50994.ko:
<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 당신이 살던 렌더시아가
　지금 어떻게 됐는가…….
　그걸 알 수 있는 수단이 여기 있습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50994.zh-Hans:
<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你原来所在的冷达西亚
现在究竟如何……
得到答案的方法就在这里。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50994.zh-Hant:
<voice 04033_00050994><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你原本所在的冷達西亞
現在究竟如何……
得到答案的方法就在這裡。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50995.en:
<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This is the Brave Stone. A secret stone that, if it
were used by the Hero, one could even cross the
dimensional barrier to any place one desired.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50995.ja:
<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「これは　ブレイブストーン。
　勇者が使ったならば　次元の壁さえも超えて
　好きな場所に　移動できるという秘石です。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50995.ko:
<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 이건 브레이브 스톤.
　용사가 사용하면 차원의 벽마저 뛰어넘어
　원하는 곳으로 이동할 수 있는 신비한 돌이죠.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50995.zh-Hans:
<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>这是勇气之石。
勇者使用这块秘石，就能穿越次元的壁垒，
移动到想去的地方。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50995.zh-Hant:
<voice 04142_00050995><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>這是勇氣之石。
這是當勇者使用時甚至能越過次元的牆壁，
移動到想去的地方的祕藏之石。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50996.en: <voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>If I use this we can return to True Lendersia!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50996.ja:
<voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「それを使えば　私たちは
　真のレンダーシアに　帰れるんですか！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50996.ko:
<voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그걸 사용하면 저희는
　진짜 렌더시아로 돌아갈 수 있는 건가요!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50996.zh-Hans:
<voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>只要使用它，
我们就能回到真冷达西亚了吗？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50996.zh-Hant:
<voice 04202_00050996><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>只要使用它，
我們就能回到真冷達西亞了嗎？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50997.en:
<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>This is the way. The False Hero, after she awakened,
intended to use this stone to cross over into True
Lendersia, it seems.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50997.ja:
<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「その通り。偽りの勇者は　覚醒を迎えた後に
　この石を使って　真のレンダーシアへと
　渡るつもりだったのでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50997.ko:
<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그렇습니다. 가짜 용사는 각성한 후에
　이 돌을 사용해 진짜 렌더시아로
　넘어갈 작정이었겠죠.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50997.zh-Hans:
<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>你说得没错。虚假的勇者也是想在觉醒之后，
使用这颗石头前往
真冷达西亚吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50997.zh-Hant:
<voice 04272_00050997><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>妳說得沒錯。冒牌勇者也是想在覺醒之後，
使用這顆石頭前往
真冷達西亞吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

50998.en:
<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>However, during the battle, the stone was damaged.
If you give me a moment, I can fix it. How about it?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50998.ja:
<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ですが　今の戦いで　石は割れてしまった。
　しばしの時が　いただけるなら
　この私が　直してみせますが　いかがです？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50998.ko:
<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 하지만 방금 그 싸움으로 돌이 깨져버렸습니다.
　제게 잠시 시간을 주시면
　고쳐 보겠습니다만, 어떠십니까?<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50998.zh-Hans:
<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>但是在刚才的战斗中石头裂开了。
如果能暂时交给我保管，
我就能修复它，如何？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
50998.zh-Hant:
<voice 04392_00050998><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>不過，在剛才的戰鬥中石頭裂開了。
如果能暫時交給我保管，
我可以修復它，如何？<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000610.en: <voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Please! Please, see to it that this stone is usable!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000610.ja:
<voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「お願いします！
　その石を　使えるようにしてください！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000610.ko:
<voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 부탁드려요!
　그 돌을 고쳐 주세요!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000610.zh-Hans:
<voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>拜托您！
请把那个石头修复至可以使用！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000610.zh-Hant:
<voice 04492_29000610><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>拜託您！
請將那個石頭修復至可以使用！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000611.en:
<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Then, please wait for me in Gran Zedora Castle's
western tower, in the princess' room on the 3rd floor.
As soon as the stone is repaired, I shall deliver it.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000611.ja:
<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「では　グランゼドーラ城の　西の塔
　３階の姫の部屋で　お待ちください。
　石が直り次第　お届けにあがりましょう。　<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000611.ko:
<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그럼 그랑제도라성 서쪽 탑
　3층에 있는 공주의 방에서 기다려 주십시오.
　돌을 고치는 대로 전해 드리러 가겠습니다. <stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000611.zh-Hans:
<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那么请在古兰泽朵拉城西塔
３楼的公主房间等候。
等石头修好，就会送过去。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000611.zh-Hant:
<voice 04577_29000611><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那麼請在古蘭澤朵拉城西塔
３樓的公主房間等候。
等石頭修好，就會送過去。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000612.en:
<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>, did you hear that. Let's briefly return
to Gran Zedora Castle.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000612.ja:
<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>　聞いてのとおりよ。
　私たちは　いったん
　グランゼドーラ城に　戻りましょう。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000612.ko:
<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>, 들었지?
　우린 일단
　그랑제도라성으로 돌아가자.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000612.zh-Hans:
<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，就按他说的。
我们先回古兰泽朵拉城吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000612.zh-Hant:
<voice 04783_29000612><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>，就按照他說的。
我們先回古蘭澤朵拉城吧。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000613.en: <voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>And then... Together to True Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000613.ja:
<voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「そして……
　共に　真のレンダーシアへ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000613.ko:
<voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 그리고……
　함께 진짜 렌더시아로 가는 거야!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000613.zh-Hans:
<voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>然后……
一起去真冷达西亚！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000613.zh-Hant:
<voice 04839_29000613><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>然後……
一起去真冷達西亞！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53839.en:
<voice 00190_00053839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>This room... The room in True Gran Zedora Castle
that I lived in, they really do look identical...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53839.ja:
<voice 00190_00053839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「この部屋……。私の暮らしていた
　本当のグランゼドーラ城の部屋と
　まったく　同じなのね……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53839.ko:
<voice 00190_00053839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 이 방……. 내가 살았던
　진짜 그랑제도라성의 방과
　완전히 똑같아…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53839.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00053839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>这个房间……和我曾经生活过的
真正的古兰泽朵拉城的房间
是完全一样的……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53839.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00053839><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>這個房間……和我住的
真正古蘭澤朵拉城的房間
完全一樣……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000614.en:
<voice 00290_29000614><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>The Brave Stone that the Evil Hero left behind, if
Crows can fix, we will return to True Lendersia,
it seems.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000614.ja:
<voice 00290_29000614><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「魔勇者が残した　ブレイブストーンを
　クロウズさんが　直してくれれば
　真のレンダーシアへ　帰れるらしいわ。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000614.ko:
<voice 00290_29000614><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 마용사가 남긴 브레이브 스톤을
　크로우즈 씨가 고치면
　진짜 렌더시아로 갈 수 있다고 해.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000614.zh-Hans:
<voice 00290_29000614><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>听说只要库洛乌兹修复
魔勇者留下的勇气之石，
就可以回到真冷达西亚。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000614.zh-Hant:
<voice 00290_29000614><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>聽說只要庫洛茲修復
魔勇者留下的勇氣之石，
就可以回到真冷達西亞。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000615.en: <voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Still, I haven't had any contact from Crows yet...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000615.ja:
<voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「まだ　クロウズさんからは
　なんの連絡もないけれど……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000615.ko:
<voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 크로우즈 씨에게서는
　아직 아무 연락이 없지만…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000615.zh-Hans:
<voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>虽然库洛乌兹还没有
捎来任何联系就是了……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000615.zh-Hant:
<voice 00320_29000615><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>雖然庫洛茲還沒有
捎來任何聯絡就是了……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000616.en: <voice 01755_29000616><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>My apologies for keeping you waiting.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000616.ja: <voice 01755_29000616><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「お待たせしてしまいました。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000616.ko: <voice 01755_29000616><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 기다리시게 해서 죄송합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53842.en: <voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Mr. Crows! What has become of the Bravestone!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53842.ja:
<voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「クロウズさん！
　ブレイブストーンは　どうなりました！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53842.ko:
<voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 크로우즈 씨!
　브레이브 스톤은 어떻게 됐나요!?<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53842.zh-Hans:
<voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>库洛乌兹！
勇气之石怎么样了？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53842.zh-Hant:
<voice 00675_00053842><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>庫洛茲！
勇氣之石狀況如何！？<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51008.en:
<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Rest assured. It's been flawlessly repaired. Here,
please take it.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51008.ja:
<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「ご安心を。完璧に　直してきました。
　どうぞ　お受け取りください。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51008.ko:
<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 걱정 마십시오. 완벽하게 고쳤으니까요.
　여기, 받으시죠.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51008.zh-Hans:
<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>放心吧，我完美地修好了。
请收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51008.zh-Hant:
<voice 00720_00051008><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>放心吧，我完美地修好了。
請收下吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

51009.en:
<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Thank you so much! With this, we can return to
True Lendersia!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51009.ja:
<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「ありがとうございます。
　これで　私たちは　真のレンダーシアへと
　帰れるんですね！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51009.ko:
<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 감사합니다.
　이제 저희는 진짜 렌더시아로
　돌아갈 수 있는 거군요!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51009.zh-Hans:
<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>谢谢您。
这样我们就能回到
真冷达西亚了吧！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
51009.zh-Hant:
<voice 00945_00051009><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>謝謝您。
這樣我們就能回到
真冷達西亞了吧！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53843.en:
<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>Now then, Princess Anlucia. I want you to call to
mind the Gran Zedora you know so well.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53843.ja:
<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「それでは　アンルシア姫。
　あなたがよく知っている　グランゼドーラを
　心の中に　思い浮かべるのです。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53843.ko:
<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그럼 안루시아 공주님.
　공주님이 아시는 그랑제도라를
　마음속에 떠올려 보십시오.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53843.zh-Hans:
<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那么，安露西雅公主。
请你在心中想象一下
你所熟知的古兰泽朵拉。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53843.zh-Hant:
<voice 01000_00053843><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>那麼，安露西亞公主，
在心中想像妳所熟知的
古蘭澤朵拉吧。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53844.en:
<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>If you can do that, the Brave Stone will surely respond
to your wish.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53844.ja:
<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>「そうすれば　ブレイブストーンは
　必ずや　あなたの思いに　応えるでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53844.ko:
<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>: 그러면 브레이브 스톤은 반드시
　공주님의 마음에 응답할 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53844.zh-Hans:
<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>只要这么做，
勇气之石就必定会回应你的想法。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53844.zh-Hant:
<voice 01030_00053844><start_lip_sync n02025 _normal m00001>如此，
勇氣之石也必定會呼應你的意念。<stop_lip_animation n02025 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53845.en: <voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I understand. I'll give it a try!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53845.ja: <voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「わかりました。やってみます！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53845.ko: <voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 알겠습니다. 해 볼게요!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53845.zh-Hans: <voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>明白了。我试一试！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53845.zh-Hant: <voice 01075_00053845><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我知道了，我試試！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

53846.en: <voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Take us to TRUE LENDERSIA!!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53846.ja: <voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「私たちを　真のレンダーシアに！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53846.ko: <voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 우리를 진짜 렌더시아로!!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53846.zh-Hans: <voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>带我们回真冷达西亚吧！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
53846.zh-Hant: <voice 01425_00053846><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>帶我們回真冷達西亞吧！！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75305.en:
<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>You have come, opponents of Lady Anlucia. If you
intend to go to the Creation Vortex, you will have to
defeat me.<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75305.ja:
<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>「来たか　アンルシアさまに　盾つく者よ。
　創生の渦へ　向かうつもりならば
　この私を　倒さねばならんぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75305.ko:
<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>: 왔군, 안루시아 님께 맞서는 자여.
　창생의 소용돌이로 가고 싶다면
　나를 먼저 쓰러뜨려야 할 것이다.<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75305.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>反抗安露西雅殿下的人啊，
你们终于来了。
想去创生漩涡的话就先打倒我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75305.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00075305><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>來了嗎？反抗安露西亞殿下的人。
如果你們想前往創生漩渦，
就得先打倒我。<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75306.en:
<voice 00293_00075306><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>However, Master Kirgyl's research has granted me
great demonic power. Do you really think you can
defeat me?<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75306.ja:
<voice 00293_00075306><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>「だが　キルギルさまの研究によって
　魔物のチカラを得た私を　はたして
　キサマらごときが　倒せるかな？<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75306.ko:
<voice 00293_00075306><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>: 하지만 키르길 님의 연구 덕분에
　마물의 힘을 얻은 날 과연
　너희 따위가 쓰러뜨릴 수 있을까?<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75306.zh-Hans:
<voice 00293_00075306><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>不过通过基尔吉尔大人的研究，
我得到了怪物的力量。
就凭你们能打倒我吗？<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75306.zh-Hant:
<voice 00293_00075306><start_lip_sync n02075 _normal m00001>但我在基爾吉爾大人的研究下，
獲得了怪物的力量，
憑你們這些貨色真的能打倒我嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02075 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75307.ja: <voice 00505_00075307><start_lip_sync m08203 _normal m00001>「グオオォォォォン！！<stop_lip_animation m08203 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75307.zh-Hans: <voice 00505_00075307><start_lip_sync m08203 _normal m00001>嗷嗷嗷嗷嗷！<stop_lip_animation m08203 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75307.zh-Hant: <voice 00505_00075307><start_lip_sync m08203 _normal m00001>唔喔喔喔喔喔喔！！<stop_lip_animation m08203 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75308.en:
A crystal claw of white light descended from above
to <cs_pchero>.
75308.ja:
<cs_pchero>のもとに　天から
白い光を宿した　水晶のツメが降ってきた。
75308.ko:
<cs_pchero>에게 하늘에서
하얀 빛을 띤 수정 발톱이 떨어졌다.
75308.zh-Hans:
闪耀着白色光芒的水晶之爪
从空中落到<cs_pchero>身边。
75308.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>的身邊，從天降下
帶著白光的水晶之爪。

29000860.en:
<cs_pchero> obtained the
White Crystal Claw (Key Item)!<me 60>
29000860.ja:
<cs_pchero>は
白水晶のツメ（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
29000860.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>获得了
白水晶之爪（重要物品）！<me 60>
29000860.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>獲得了
白水晶之爪（重要物品）！<me 60>

75310.en:
<voice 00190_00075310><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>For you to have come this far must mean that you
have defeated Gezra.<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75310.ja:
<voice 00190_00075310><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>「ここまで　来られたということは
　ゲゾラめは　倒されたようですね。<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75310.ko:
<voice 00190_00075310><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>: 여기까지 온 걸 보니
　게조라를 쓰러뜨린 모양이군요.<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75310.zh-Hans:
<voice 00190_00075310><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>你能到这里来
就证明你打败了盖奏拉。<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75310.zh-Hant:
<voice 00190_00075310><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>能夠來到這邊，
表示蓋奏拉被打倒了。<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75311.en:
<voice 00235_00075311><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>However, Gezra was merely a prototype. You still know
nothing of the results of Master Kirgyl's research...<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75311.ja:
<voice 00235_00075311><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>「ですが　ゲゾラは試作品に過ぎません。
　あなたは　まだ　キルギルさまの
　研究成果を　何も知らぬに等しい……。<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75311.ko:
<voice 00235_00075311><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>: 하지만 게조라는 시제품일 뿐입니다.
　당신은 아직 키르길 님의
　연구 성과를 아무것도 모르는 셈이죠…….<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75311.zh-Hans:
<voice 00235_00075311><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>但盖奏拉不过是个试验品。
可以说你们对基尔吉尔大人的
研究成果还一无所知……<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75311.zh-Hant:
<voice 00235_00075311><start_lip_sync n02074 _normal m00001>不過，蓋奏拉也只是個試作品。
你還不知道基爾吉爾大人的研究成果
有多厲害……<stop_lip_animation n02074 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75312.en:
<voice 00495_00075312><start_lip_sync m09004 _normal m00001>Man and monster combined, I am Grimos! It's time to
realize my true power!<stop_lip_animation m09004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75312.ja:
<voice 00495_00075312><start_lip_sync m09004 _normal m00001>「人と魔物を合わせた　このグリモスのチカラ！
　その身で　思い知るがいいでしょう！！<stop_lip_animation m09004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75312.ko:
<voice 00495_00075312><start_lip_sync m09004 _normal m00001>: 사람과 마물을 융합한 이 그리모스의 힘!
　직접 맛보게 해 드리죠!!<stop_lip_animation m09004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75312.zh-Hans:
<voice 00495_00075312><start_lip_sync m09004 _normal m00001>我是融合了人与怪物力量的古里莫斯！
你们就亲身体会一下我的力量吧！<stop_lip_animation m09004 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75312.zh-Hant:
<voice 00495_00075312><start_lip_sync m09004 _normal m00001>我古里莫斯的力量，就是結合人類與怪物產生的！
你就親身體驗看看吧！！<stop_lip_animation m09004 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75313.en:
A crystal claw of gray light descended from above
to <cs_pchero>.
75313.ja:
<cs_pchero>のもとに　天から
灰色の光を宿した　水晶のツメが降ってきた。
75313.ko:
<cs_pchero>에게 하늘에서
잿빛을 띤 수정 발톱이 떨어졌다.
75313.zh-Hans:
闪耀着灰色光芒的水晶之爪
从空中落到<cs_pchero>身边。
75313.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>的身邊，從天降下
帶著灰光的水晶之爪。

29000861.en:
<cs_pchero> obtained the
Ash Crystal Claw (Key Item)!<me 60>
29000861.ja:
<cs_pchero>は
灰水晶のツメ（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
29000861.ko:
{cs_pchero}|hpp(은,는)
잿빛 수정 발톱(중요한 물건)을 손에 넣었다!<me 60>
29000861.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>获得了
灰水晶之爪（重要物品）！<me 60>
29000861.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>獲得了
灰水晶之爪（重要物品）！<me 60>

75315.en:
<voice 00300_00075315><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>...I see. I understand now why Master Kirgyl entrusted
me to guard this place.<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75315.ja:
<voice 00300_00075315><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「……なるほど。
　キルギルさまが　ここの守りを
　私に　まかせた理由が　今わかった。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75315.ko:
<voice 00300_00075315><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: ……그래.
　키르길 님이 이곳의 방어를
　내게 맡기신 이유를 이제 알겠군.<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75315.zh-Hans:
<voice 00300_00075315><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>……原来如此。
我终于明白基尔吉尔大人
让我守护这里的原因了。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75315.zh-Hant:
<voice 00300_00075315><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>……原來如此，
我現在終於瞭解基爾吉爾大人
把這裡的守護工作交給我的理由了。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75316.en:
<voice 00390_00075316><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>I know you. In Arahaghiro Kingdom, I saw you during
the battle with King Bermud.<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75316.ja:
<voice 00390_00075316><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「私は　お前を知っているぞ。
　アラハギーロ王国での　ベルムド王との戦いは
　見させてもらったからな。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75316.ko:
<voice 00390_00075316><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: 난 네가 누군지 안다.
　아라하길로 왕국에서 벨무드 왕과 싸우는 걸
　지켜봤거든.<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75316.zh-Hans:
<voice 00390_00075316><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>我认识你。
我见过你在艾拉哈奇罗王国
和贝尔穆德王的战斗。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75316.zh-Hant:
<voice 00390_00075316><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>我知道你。
我有觀賞到你在艾拉哈奇羅王國中
與貝爾穆德王的交戰。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75317.en:
<voice 00526_00075317><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>If you intend to use that power against Lady Anlucia,
then I have no choice but to kill you...<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75317.ja:
<voice 00526_00075317><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>「それだけのチカラを持つ　お前が
　アンルシアさまに　敵対するというならば
　私は　お前を　仕留めねばならん……。<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75317.ko:
<voice 00526_00075317><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>: 그 정도의 힘을 가진 네가
　안루시아 님께 대적하려 한다면
　난 네 숨통을 끊을 수밖에…….<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75317.zh-Hans:
<voice 00526_00075317><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>你拥有强大的力量，
如果你要和安露西雅殿下作对，
我就必须解决你……<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75317.zh-Hant:
<voice 00526_00075317><start_lip_sync n02037 _normal m00001>你擁有這麼強大的力量，
既然你要跟安露西亞殿下敵對，
那我就必須解決你……<stop_lip_animation n02037 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75318.en:
<voice 00821_00075318><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>Do not think that I am the same as the demonic
soldiers you fought up to now. I am the culmination
of Master Kirgyl's research!
<auto_br=3500>
I am... The ultimate soldier!!<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75318.ja:
<voice 00821_00075318><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>「これまでに戦った魔創兵と　同じと思うな。
　キルギルさまの研究の集大成！
　究極無双の兵士……それが　私なのだ！！<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75318.ko:
<voice 00821_00075318><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>: 난 지금까지 싸운 마창병과는 달라.
　키르길 님의 연구의 집대성!
　궁극 무쌍의 병사…… 그게 바로 나다!!<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75318.zh-Hans:
<voice 00821_00075318><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>不要以为我和你之前打倒的魔创兵一样。
我是基尔吉尔大人研究的最终成果！
是终极无双的士兵！<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75318.zh-Hant:
<voice 00821_00075318><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>你可別以為我和你過去戰鬥過的魔創兵一樣。
我是基爾吉爾大人研究的集大成！
獨一無二的終極士兵……就是我！！<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75319.en:
<voice 00025_00075319><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>Hou...To show up in front of me even after taking a
beating. I admit you have a lot of spirit.<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75319.ja:
<voice 00025_00075319><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>「ほう……。あれだけ　痛めつけられて
　なお　私の前に　現れるとはな。
　その意気だけは　認めてやってもよい。<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75319.ko:
<voice 00025_00075319><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>: 호오……. 그렇게 뜨거운 맛을 보고도
　다시 내 앞에 나타나다니.
　그 기개만큼은 인정해 주마.<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75319.zh-Hans:
<voice 00025_00075319><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>哦……吃了那么大苦头
居然还敢出现在我面前。
很有决心嘛。<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75319.zh-Hant:
<voice 00025_00075319><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>喔……受到那麼大的傷害，
竟然還出現在我面前。
有勇氣這點倒是值得嘉許。<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75320.en:
<voice 00155_00075320><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>But I can't let you go to Lady Anlucia. Your fate is
to die here!<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75320.ja:
<voice 00155_00075320><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>「だが　お前を　アンルシアさまのもとへ
　行かせるわけには　いかぬ。
　ここで　朽ち果てるのが　お前の運命だ！<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75320.ko:
<voice 00155_00075320><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>: 하지만 네가 안루시아 님께
　가도록 둘 수는 없다.
　여기서 쓰러지는 것이 네 운명이다!<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75320.zh-Hans:
<voice 00155_00075320><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>但是我不能让你
去安露西雅殿下那里。
你命中注定要死在这里！<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75320.zh-Hant:
<voice 00155_00075320><start_lip_sync m08804 _normal m00001>但我不會讓你去到安露西亞殿下的身邊。
在這裡受死就是你該有的未來！<stop_lip_animation m08804 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75321.en:
A crystal claw of black light descended from above
to <cs_pchero>.
75321.ja:
<cs_pchero>のもとに　天から
黒い光を宿した　水晶のツメが降ってきた。
75321.ko:
<cs_pchero>에게 하늘에서
검은 빛을 띤 수정 발톱이 떨어졌다.
75321.zh-Hans:
闪耀着黑色光芒的水晶之爪
从空中落到<cs_pchero>身边。
75321.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>的身邊，從天降下
帶著黑光的水晶之爪。

29000862.en:
<cs_pchero> obtained the
Black Crystal Claw (Key Item)!<me 60>
29000862.ja:
<cs_pchero>は
黒水晶のツメ（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
29000862.zh-Hans:
<cs_pchero>获得了
黑水晶之爪（重要物品）！<me 60>
29000862.zh-Hant:
<cs_pchero>獲得了
黑水晶之爪（重要物品）！<me 60>

75323.en:
<voice 00040_00075323><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>...Urgh. No. Not yet... I must obtain the power of
the Hero, no matter what it takes...<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75323.ja:
<voice 00040_00075323><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「…………ぬうう。
　まだだ……。私は　なんとしても
　勇者のチカラを　手に入れるのだ……。<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75323.ko:
<voice 00040_00075323><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>: …………으으윽.
　아직이다……. 난 어떻게든
　용사의 힘을 손에 넣을 것이다…….<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75323.zh-Hans:
<voice 00040_00075323><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>……呜。
还不能死……我一定要
得到勇者之力……<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75323.zh-Hant:
<voice 00040_00075323><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>……唔唔。
還沒……不論如何，
我都要得到勇者的力量……<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75324.en:
<voice 00161_00075324><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>And until I have it, I will rise again and again!
I will never give up...!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75324.ja:
<voice 00161_00075324><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「そのためならば　何度でも　立ち上がる。
　決して　あきらめはせぬぞ……！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75324.ko:
<voice 00161_00075324><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>: 그러기 위해서라면 몇 번이고 일어서겠어.
　절대로 포기하지 않아……!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75324.zh-Hans:
<voice 00161_00075324><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>为了勇者之力，不管多少次我都会站起来。
我绝不放弃！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75324.zh-Hant:
<voice 00161_00075324><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>為了這個目的，不管幾次我都會站起來。
我絕對不會放棄……！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75325.en:
<voice 00400_00075325><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>Damn... Every time we beat her, she just gets right
back up...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75325.ja:
<voice 00400_00075325><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「くっ……。倒しても　倒しても
　立ち上がってくるなんて。
　このままでは……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75325.ko:
<voice 00400_00075325><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 크윽……. 쓰러뜨려도 쓰러뜨려도
　다시 일어서다니.
　이대로 가다가는…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75325.zh-Hans:
<voice 00400_00075325><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>唔……打倒了她这么多次
居然还能重新站起来。
这样下去……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75325.zh-Hant:
<voice 00400_00075325><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>唔……不管打倒幾次，
都還是會站起來。
這樣下去……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75326.en: <voice 00461_00075326><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>But we can't just give up here.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75326.ja:
<voice 00461_00075326><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「だけど　<cs_pchero>。
　私たちは　ここで
　くじけるわけには　いかないの。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75326.ko:
<voice 00461_00075326><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 하지만 <cs_pchero>.
　우린 여기서
　좌절할 수 없어.<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75326.zh-Hans:
<voice 00461_00075326><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不过，<cs_pchero>。
我们不能在这里放弃。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75326.zh-Hant:
<voice 00461_00075326><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不過，<cs_pchero>，
我們不能在這裡
受挫。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75327.en:
<voice 00500_00075327><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>No matter how many times she gets back up, we will
defeat her!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75327.ja:
<voice 00500_00075327><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「何度　相手が立ち上がろうと
　私たちで　打ち倒しましょう！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75327.ko:
<voice 00500_00075327><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 상대가 몇 번을 일어나든
　우리가 무찌르자!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75327.zh-Hans:
<voice 00500_00075327><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不管对手站起来几次，
我们都要打倒对方！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75327.zh-Hant:
<voice 00500_00075327><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>不管對手站起來幾次，
我們都要打倒對方！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75328.en:
<voice 00561_00075328><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>It's futile! Know that whatever you do, you cannot
destroy me!!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75328.ja:
<voice 00561_00075328><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「無駄だ。お前たちが　何をしようと
　私を滅ぼすことは　できぬと知れ！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75328.ko:
<voice 00561_00075328><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>: 소용없다. 네놈들이 무슨 짓을 하든
　날 없애지는 못해!!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75328.zh-Hans:
<voice 00561_00075328><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>没用的。无论你们做什么，
都无法消灭我！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75328.zh-Hant:
<voice 00561_00075328><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>沒用的。搞清楚，不管你們做什麼，
都沒辦法打倒我！！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75904.en:
<voice 00811_00075904><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>With this cloak of darkness, woven from the Creation
Magic, your attacks will be worthless! Bow down to
my supreme power!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75904.ja:
<voice 00811_00075904><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>「創生の魔力より生み出せし　この闇のころもを
　まとった今　もはや　お前たちの攻撃など
　通じはせぬ！　我がチカラに　ひれ伏すがよい！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75904.ko:
<voice 00811_00075904><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>: 창생의 마력으로 만들어진 이 어둠의 의복을
　두른 지금, 너희의 공격 따위는
　통하지 않는다! 내 힘에 굴복해라!<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75904.zh-Hans:
<voice 00811_00075904><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>有了创生魔力制造出的这个黑暗之衣，
你们的攻击已经对我不起作用了！
跪倒在我的力量前吧！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75904.zh-Hant:
<voice 00811_00075904><start_lip_sync m50065 _normal m00001>我現在穿上用創生魔力做出來的
闇之衣，你們的攻擊已經
沒有任何效果了！臣服在我力量之下吧！<stop_lip_animation m50065 CLOSE_MOUTH>

75905.en: <voice 00900_00075905><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>What a sinister form...<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75905.ja: <voice 00900_00075905><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「なんて　まがまがしい姿なの……。<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75905.ko: <voice 00900_00075905><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 정말 흉측한 모습이야…….<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75905.zh-Hans: <voice 00900_00075905><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>多么不祥的外貌……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
75905.zh-Hant: <voice 00900_00075905><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>真是可怕的樣貌……<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000617.en:
<voice 00980_29000617><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>I'll use my power of the Hero to dispel that cloak
of darkness one way or the other! Everyone, let's go!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000617.ja:
<voice 00980_29000617><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>「私の勇者のチカラで　あの闇のころもを
　なんとかしてみせるわ！
　みんな　いくわよっ！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000617.ko:
<voice 00980_29000617><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>: 내 용사의 힘으로
　저 어둠의 의복을 어떻게든 해 볼게!
　다들, 가자!<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000617.zh-Hans:
<voice 00980_29000617><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我会用我勇者的力量，
来处理那个黑暗之衣！
各位，要上了！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000617.zh-Hant:
<voice 00980_29000617><start_lip_sync c00552 _normal m00001>我會用我勇者的力量
來處理那個闇之衣！
各位，要上囉！<stop_lip_animation c00552 CLOSE_MOUTH>
